Package adept.module

Provides interfaces and classes to support DEFT TA1 algorithm implementations in the ADEPT framework, primarily based on the AbstractModule class along with a set of Processor interfaces, which together support specific subclasses for analysis, extraction, tagging and other algorithms.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IChunkProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface IChunkProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform chunk-level processing and return as output HLT content.
    IConversationProcessor
    The IConversationProcessor Interface defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that process CUBISM Conversation objects..
    IDocumentHltContentProcessor<T extends HltContent> Deprecated
    Use IDocumentProcessor instead.
    IDocumentListProcessor
    The Interface IDocumentListProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that process list of Documents and returns HltContentContainer object containing one or more objects of HltContent type.
    IDocumentProcessor
    The Interface IDocumentProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that for HL content extraction and need additional (or previously extracted) HLT metadata available in HltContentContainer to output an augmented or new HltContentContainer containing one or more objects of HltContent type.
    IModule
    The Interface IModule defines the interfaces that are generic across all the ADEPT algorithm modules.
    IPassagePairProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface IPassagePairProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform processing on pair of passages.
    IPassageProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface IPassageProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform passage-level processing and return as output HLT content.
    ISentencePairProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface ISentencePairProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform processing on pair of sentences.
    ISentenceProcessor<T extends HltContent>
    The Interface ISentenceProcessor defines the interfaces that will be implemented by ADEPT modules that perform sentence-level processing. .
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractModule
    The Class AbstractModule is an abstract definition of an algorithm module that implements the IModule interface.
    AcousticInteractionAnalyzer
    The Class AcousticInteractionAnalyzer - An instance can be created to support InterPausalUnit output.
    AnomalousTextDetector
    The Class AnomalousTextDetector - An instance can be created to support AnomalousText output.
    CommittedBeliefTagger
    The Class OpinionTagger.
    ConversationAnnotator
    The Class ConversationAnnotator.
    CoreferenceResolver
    The Class CoreferenceResolver.
    EntityMentionDetector
    The Class EntityMentionDetector - An instance can be created to support EntityMention output.
    EventCoreferenceResolver
    The Class EventCoreferenceResolver.
    JointCoreferenceRelationExtractor
    The Class JointCoreferenceRelationExtractor - An instance can be created to support JointRelationCoreference output.
    ModuleConfig
    This class extends from configuration (or properties) class that has Hashtable-based Key-Values.
    ModuleTraits
    The Class ModuleTraits are basically the descriptions/features of an algorithm such as expected input/output data types and dependencies, nature of NLP processing performed by the algorithm as well as other user-defined key-value properties.
    NamedEntityTagger
    The Class NamedEntityTagger.
    NoveltyDetector
    The Class NoveltyDetector.
    OpinionTagger
    The Class OpinionTagger.
    Paraphraser
    The Class Paraphraser.
    PosTagger
    The Class PosTagger.
    RelationExtractor
    The Class RelationExtractor - An instance can be created to support Relation output.
    SarcasmDetector
    The Class SarcasmDetector.
    SentenceSimilarityDetector
    The Class SentenceSimilarityDetector.
    SocialEventExtractor
    The Class SocialEventExtractor - An instance can be created to support Relation output.
    SpeechSegmentor
    The Class SpeechSegmentor - An instance of SpeechSegmentor can be created to support Sentence, DiscourseUnit and ProsodicPhrase output.
    SyntacticChunker
    The Class SyntacticChunker.
    TextualEntailmentDetector
    The Class TextualEntailmentDetector.
    UncertaintyDetector
    The Class UncertaintyDetector - An instance of UncertaintyDetector can be created to support Sentence, DiscoureUnit and ProsodicPhrase output.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AdeptModuleException
    AdeptModuleException is to handle exception in the modules.

Package adept.module Description

Provides interfaces and classes to support DEFT TA1 algorithm implementations in the ADEPT framework, primarily based on the AbstractModule class along with a set of Processor interfaces, which together support specific subclasses for analysis, extraction, tagging and other algorithms.
